questions.question: What new feature did Microsoft recently introduce for Windows 11 PCs?
questions.explain: Microsoft introduced Xbox Copilot, which enhances gaming accessibility on Windows 11.

questions.question: Which tech company claims to remove CO2 more efficiently than its competitors?
questions.explain: DACLab asserts it can remove CO2 using less electricity than many competitors in the carbon capture sector.

questions.question: What major concern does Satya Nadella have regarding Microsoft's future?
questions.explain: Satya Nadella expressed concerns about Microsoft's ability to thrive in the rapidly evolving AI landscape.

questions.question: What recent action has been taken by a new bill in the U.S. concerning online content?
questions.explain: A new bill aims to block both online adult content and VPNs, raising concerns about internet freedom.

questions.question: What is Microsoft planning to turn Foxconn's empty buildings into?
questions.explain: Microsoft is converting Foxconn's empty buildings into what they claim will be the world's most powerful AI data center.
